meanings.definition: A sudden explosion of a bomb or other explosive device in the air.
meanings.sent1: The airbursts shook the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The airbursts in the sky were part of the fireworks display.
meanings.sent3: The airbursts startled the birds, making them fly in all directions.
meanings.sent4: The airbursts of laughter filled the room during the comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The airbursts of color in the painting added a dynamic touch.

meanings.definition: The act of bursting or exploding in the air.
meanings.sent1: During the storm, we witnessed airbursts of lightning in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The airbursts of confetti at the celebration added to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The airbursts of bubbles from the soap dispenser delighted the children.
meanings.sent4: The airbursts of flavor in the spicy dish surprised my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The airbursts of applause erupted as the performer took the stage.
